name: @bombaysoftwares/tskit
description: The @bombaysoftwares/tskit package provides a set of utility functions for working with dates and timestamps in JavaScript. These functions simplify common tasks such as date formatting, timestamp conversion, and JSON validation.
author: Bombay Softwares

scripts.version:add:
echo "/*! @bombaysoftwares/tskit ! v - $(npm run version:extract --silent)
 * license : MIT
 Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')
 */
$(cat dist/index.min.js)" > dist/index.min.js
scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && npm run minifyTS --silent && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
